data.title: 787059 PIN Code Area & City in Assam State, India
data.meta_description: We found a total of 10 post offices linked with the postal code 787059. This PIN Code is associated with Dhemaji district of Assam in India. The first digit of ZIP Code 787059 i.e. 7 represents the region Assam, the second digit 8 denotes the sub-region Dibrugarh and the third digit 7 indicates the sorting-district Dhemaji.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

Ques 1.: What place does the PIN code 787059 belongs to?

Ans.: The name of the area with which the PIN Code 787059 belongs to is Sissibargaon, Dhemaji in the Assam state of India.

Ques 2.: How many post offices are linked with the PIN Code 787059?

Ans.: There are around 10 post offices in Dhemaji that are linked with the PIN Code 787059. Few of them are: Betanipam, Cementmukh, Madhuripathar, Akajan Bormuria, Bhagwan and Demow Chariali.

Ques 3.: What is the postal code 787059 made up of?

Ans.: The 1st digit of the postal code 787059 i.e. 7 represents the region Assam, the 2nd digit 8 denotes the sub-region Dibrugarh and the 3rd digit 7 indicates the sorting-district Dhemaji. And the rest of the digits, 059, represent a particular post office.

Ques 4.: How many villages have the PIN Code 787059?

Ans.: There are around 188 villages in Assam which have the PIN code as 787059. Few of them are: Kakabari Dharmapur, Chilagutung (Part), Bukabil Manikpur, Geluakenduguri (Part), Bhalukaguri Dambuk, Dimow Miri Pathar, Akajan Miri, Handiqui Gaon, Alu Para and Adhakhana No.3 (Grazing N.C).
